name: Gone: Survival
description:
Before you opens a large open world with many mysteries and secrets. To survive in this dangerous world you need to collect food, water, medicines, equipment and weapons, as well as grow plants. You will have the opportunity to complete tasks in order to earn experience and discover new items for crafting. Kill zombies and clear locations.

Grab, Fight, Survive

Build your shelters, creating a safe zone where you can wait out the impending danger.
